name: Cloud Computing Platforms
description: Hands-on experience with major cloud platforms, focusing on deployment, scaling, and serverless architectures.

name: Cyber Security Fundamentals
description: Introduction to information security, threat analysis, and basic defense mechanisms.

name: Mobile Application Development (Android)
description: Building native Android applications using Kotlin and modern Android Jetpack components.

name: Cross-Platform Mobile Dev (Flutter)
description: Create beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase.

name: Game Design & Unity
description: Learn the principles of game design and develop 2D/3D games using the Unity engine.

name: Internet of Things (IoT) Basics
description: Connecting physical devices to the internet, sensor data collection, and microcontroller programming.

name: Data Analysis with Python
description: Analyzing and visualizing data using Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib.

name: User Interface (UI) Design
description: Principles of visual design, typography, and color theory for digital interfaces.

name: User Experience (UX) Research
description: Understanding user needs through research methods, usability testing, and prototyping.

name: Full Stack Web Development
description: Building complete web applications with a modern stack (MERN/PERN).

name: Finnish for Exchange Students 1
description: Survival Finnish for everyday situations and introduction to Finnish culture.

name: Professional English Communication
description: Improving professional writing and presentation skills in English.

name: Project Management Basics
description: Introduction to project management methodologies, including Agile and Scrum.

name: Digital Marketing & SEO
description: Strategies for online visibility, content marketing, and search engine optimization.

name: 3D Modeling with Blender
description: Creating 3D models, texturing, and rendering using Blender.

name: Ethical Hacking
description: Learning offensive security techniques to better understand how to defend systems.

name: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Understanding core ML algorithms and implementing them using Scikit-learn.

name: DevOps & CI/CD
description: Automating software delivery pipelines using Docker, Jenkins, and GitHub Actions.

name: Virtual Reality (VR) Development
description: Creating immersive virtual reality experiences and applications.

name: Sustainable Development in Tech
description: Exploring the environmental impact of technology and sustainable design practices.
